body:
[RELEASE NOTES](https://istio.io/docs/reference/release-notes.html)

Debian Packages for installing Istio sidecars on VMs
* [istio-agent](https://storage.googleapis.com/istio-release/releases/0.2.7/deb/istio-agent-release.deb)
* [istio-auth-node-agent](https://storage.googleapis.com/istio-release/releases/0.2.7/deb/istio-auth-node-agent-release.deb)
* [istio-proxy](https://storage.googleapis.com/istio-release/releases/0.2.7/deb/istio-proxy-release.deb)

[Changes since 0.2.6](http://github.com/istio/istio/wiki/v0.2.7)

name: 0.2.2 Testing / Partial pre-release of the upcoming 0.2
body:
*Note:* You need Kubernetes 1.7.4 with Alpha Features to try this early build. Earlier versions of kubernetes are no longer supported, as we rely on CustomResourceDefinitions (a feature available since k8s 1.7)

**Warning:** The next pre-release (0.2.3) may have incompatible changes with this build.

**Warning:** RBAC alpha isn't supported (use RBAC beta which all K8s 1.7+ have)

[RELEASE NOTES](https://github.com/istio/istio/wiki/v0.2.2)

name: 0.2.1 Testing / Partial pre-release of the upcoming 0.2
body:
*Note:* You need Kubernetes 1.7.3 to try this early build. Earlier versions of kubernetes are no longer supported, as we rely on CustomResourceDefinitions (a feature available since k8s 1.7)

**Warning:** The next pre-release (0.2.2) will have incompatible changes with this build.

RELEASE NOTES
============

name: Releng First test build for 0.2 release cycle
body: Note: This isn't a release, it's a test of our build process

Istio alpha release 0.1.6

Changes since 0.1.5:
- Manager->Pilot rename
- Header fix (fix for https://github.com/istio/issues/issues/8)
- details: https://github.com/istio/pilot/compare/0.1.5...0.1.6
